segments.text: How can I help you this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to take out some money , but there's a massive queue for the ATM so I thought I'd do it over the counter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Unfortunately , an ATM is being refilled because it ran out of money . That's what's causing the hold up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . I thought maybe it was just the time of the day , although it isn't usually busy at 2:30 in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are right , you've just missed the lunchtime rush . Could you fill out a withdrawal slip , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did that already , while I was waiting . Also , here's my card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please enter your personal code right here , on the key pad . And sign here , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Here's your card back and your money . Please double check it for me .
segments.speaker: S1
